config.typeset.pairs.markdownDescription: Pairs used for auto-pairing. Prefer array of 2-char pairs (open→close). You can also provide an even-length string of characters (array takes precedence).
config.timeStats.enabledLanguages.descri: Language IDs to track writing statistics (default: markdown, plaintext).
config.timeStats.idleThresholdMs.descrip: Idle threshold in milliseconds for writing statistics; inactivity above this stops counting (default: 30000).
config.timeStats.bucketSizeMs.descriptio: Time bucket size in milliseconds for CPM calculation (default: 60000).
config.timeStats.imeDebounceMs.descripti: IME debounce time in milliseconds to avoid false statistics during Chinese input (default: 350).
config.timeStats.respectWcignore.descrip: Whether writing time stats respect .wcignore (default false: only .gitignore; when true, ignored files produce no time stats).
config.timeStats.exitIdleOn.description: Condition to exit idle state (default: text change only).
config.timeStats.exitIdleOn.textChange: Exit idle state only on text changes
config.timeStats.exitIdleOn.windowFocus: Exit idle state on window focus or text changes
config.timeStats.exitIdleOn.editorChange: Exit idle state on editor switch, window focus, or text changes
config.fileTracker.respectWcignore.descr: (File Tracking only) Whether file tracking respects .wcignore ignore rules (default: false; only .gitignore). Writing time stats do not use this flag.

config.fileTracker.writeLegacySnapshot.d: Whether to emit legacy aggregated file-tracking.json snapshot (debug / external tools).
config.outline.lazyMode.description: Enable lazy outline generation: do not create/refresh outline files until an outline editor is opened.
config.timeStats.persistReadOnlySessions: Persist read-only sessions (no char changes). If false, pure reading won't touch the tracking DB.
config.timeStats.statusBar.alignment.des: Status bar location for time stats (left/right). Recreate item on change.
config.timeStats.statusBar.alignment.lef: Show on left side of status bar
config.timeStats.statusBar.alignment.rig: Show on right side of status bar
config.timeStats.statusBar.priority.desc: Status bar priority (higher appears more to the left/right within its alignment group).

walkthrough.andrea.setup.title: ANH Setup Walkthrough
walkthrough.andrea.setup.description: Complete these steps to ensure Git is available and your Git user info is configured.
walkthrough.anh.step.open.title: Get Started
walkthrough.anh.step.open.description: Welcome to the setup walkthrough. Complete each step or click retry in the top-right.
walkthrough.anh.step.checkGit.title: Check Git Installed
walkthrough.anh.step.checkGit.descriptio: Click [Check Now](command:AndreaNovelHelper.wizard.checkGit) to detect if Git is installed on this machine.
walkthrough.anh.step.installGit.title: Install Git (if missing)
walkthrough.anh.step.installGit.descript: If Git is missing, open the download page and install, then restart VS Code.
walkthrough.anh.step.checkUser.title: Check Git User Info
walkthrough.anh.step.checkUser.descripti: Click [Check User](command:AndreaNovelHelper.wizard.checkGitUser) to view effective user.name and user.email.
walkthrough.anh.step.configureUser.title: Configure or Edit Git User Info
walkthrough.anh.step.configureUser.descr: If missing or needs change, click [Configure](command:AndreaNovelHelper.wizard.configureGitUser) to interactively set user info.
walkthrough.anh.step.recheck.title: Finish and Re-verify
walkthrough.anh.step.recheck.description: Re-check results; after all steps complete you're ready to start writing.
config.workspaceDisabled.description: Disable all Andrea Novel Helper features in this workspace (acts as a soft kill switch).
WordCount: Show index prefix in label while in manual ordering mode.
config.wordCount.order.padWidth.descript: WordCount: Zero-pad width for index (0 disables).
config.wordCount.order.autoResequence.de: WordCount: Auto resequence all indices when gaps exhausted.
config.wordCount.debug.description: WordCount: Enable verbose debug logging (console). Use only for diagnosing issues; may impact performance.
command.wordCount.forceRecountAll.title: Force Recount All
command.wordCount.forceRecountHere.title: Force Recount (This File/Folder)
config.typeset.enableAutoPairs.descripti: Enable smart auto-pairs (auto-closing and wrapping selection).
config.typeset.enableSmartEnter.descript: Enable smart paragraph split on Enter (insert blank line + indent).
config.typeset.enableSmartExit.descripti: Enable smart exit from pairs: when cursor is before a closing char, Enter moves after it.
config.typeset.indentFirstTwoSpaces.desc: Insert an indent unit at paragraph start (follows editor.insertSpaces / editor.tabSize).
config.typeset.blankLinesBetweenParas.de: Number of blank lines between paragraphs (used by smart enter and full-document formatting).
config.typeset.trimTrailingSpaces.descri: Trim trailing whitespace on Enter/format operations.
config.roles.enableWordSegmentFilter.des: Enable word-segmentation filter for role matching to avoid overmatching single-character names.
config.roles.wordSegment.autoFilterMaxLe: Max role name length (chars) to auto-apply segmentation filter. Default 1 = single-char only.
config.hugeFile.thresholdBytes.descripti: Files larger than this (bytes) are treated as huge; heavy features like regex-based highlighting will be disabled and TimeStats switched to approximate mode.
config.timeStats.largeFile.thresholdByte: TimeStats: byte threshold to trigger approximate large-file statistics.
config.timeStats.largeFile.approximate.d: TimeStats: enable approximate incremental stats for large files to improve input responsiveness.
config.timeStats.largeFile.accurateEvery: TimeStats: after how many changes to perform an accurate recalibration in approximate mode.
TimeStats: minimum interval (ms) between accurate recalibrations in approximate mode.
config.timeStats.debug.description: TimeStats: output detailed debug logs (may affect performance).
config.wordCount.largeFileThreshold.desc: WordCount: byte threshold for quick estimate of large files; backend will re-count precisely later.
config.wordCount.largeFileAvgBytesPerCha: Average bytes per character used during estimate phase (bytes ÷ chars).
config.wordCount.maxWorkers.description: Number of parallel workers for word counting. 0 = auto (cpu/2 capped by maxWorkersUpperLimit).
config.wordCount.maxWorkersUpperLimit.de: Upper limit for worker auto mode to avoid saturating CPU.
config.debug.completionLog.description: Completion: output debug logs for prefix/match counts (may impact performance).
config.fileTracker.trustCallerFilters.de: If true, FileTrackingDataManager will trust that callers already applied ignore/filter rules and skip redundant checks (e.g. .git filtering). Core protections remain enforced. Enabling may yield a small performance improvement.
